entities.name: george
entities.description: George is introduced as a character who has been injured and is being carried into the house by others.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is present at George's injury and is being questioned by Lupin.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is introduced as a character who gasps in shock when she sees George's injured ear.

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is introduced as a character who bends over her son George to tend to his injury.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is introduced as a character who grabs Harry by the arm and drags him back into the kitchen for questioning.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a character who tries to ease his bulk through the back door and later roars in anger at Lupin's actions.

relationships.description: Lupin questions Harry about a creature he saw in his office at Hogwarts.
Lupin is concerned with George's injury and has to check on him.
